quest.name: Pom-pom Panic
journal: Mogmont is scouring the horizon for signs of mooglelife.
The time has come for a lookout to replace Mogmont, but the moogles meant to relieve him are nowhere to be found. Search the road to the Monsterie for any signs of the group.
You have found the first of the missing moogles, who were scattered in a sudden dragon attack. Keep an eye out for the remaining three.
The moogles look shaken, but all are unharmed. Inform the first lost moogle.
Relieved that all members of the group escaped harm, the moogles will return to Asah with their pom-poms extra alert.
objectives: Find the lost moogles on the way to the Monsterie.

dialogue.name: MOGMONT
dialogue.text: A recent spate of dragon attacks has been keeping us on guard. One can never be too careful.

dialogue.name: MOGMONT
dialogue.text: But no moogle can keep watch forever. My shift replacements were due to arrive some time ago, but there remains no sign of them. Could you see if they've run into any trouble along the road, kupo?

dialogue.name: MOGMONT
dialogue.text: Where could they be? They should've been here bells ago, kupo.

dialogue.name: DEVIATEDMOGA01834
dialogue.text: This isn't good... A nasty gang of dragons attacked my companions and me, scattering us every which way. The three of them should be around here... Have you found any trace of them, kupo?

dialogue.name: MOGMONT
dialogue.text: I can't keep up the watch much longer... Please help find the missing moogles, kupo!

dialogue.name: DEVIATEDMOGA01834
dialogue.text: They say the best tactic to use when facing a dragon is to run... They should be around here somewhere, kupo...

dialogue.name: DEVIATEDMOGB01834
dialogue.text: Where's the bloody road... Ah! Many thanks for pointing me in the right direction, kupo!

dialogue.name: DEVIATEDMOGC01834
dialogue.text: Are the dragons still out there? No? Then I guess I'll return...

dialogue.name: DEVIATEDMOGD01834
dialogue.text: We barely escaped by the fluff of our pom-poms, kupo! Well, time to go back to the others.

dialogue.name: MOGMONT
dialogue.text: I see no traces of their pom-poms on the horizon... Have you found them, kupo?

dialogue.name: DEVIATEDMOGB01834
dialogue.text: Thank heavens we all made it, kupo!

dialogue.name: DEVIATEDMOGC01834
dialogue.text: The dragons might still be around somewhere...

dialogue.name: DEVIATEDMOGD01834
dialogue.text: Blasted dragons... Let's head back to Asah before they return in greater numbers, kupo.

dialogue.name: DEVIATEDMOGA01834
dialogue.text: We would've never found our way if it wasn't for you, adventurer. We won't let any of those vile beasts take us by surprise on the way back!
